recipe.title: Fruit Salad with Honey-Lime Dressing
ingredients: 2 cups seedless red or green grapes
instructions: Whisk first 4 ingredients in small bowl to blend; set dressing aside. Combine remaining ingredients in large bowl. Cover dressing and fruit separately and chill until ready to serve, up to 6 hours. Mix dressing into fruit. Let stand 15 minutes to blend flavors.

Mix dressing into fruit. Let stand 15 minutes to blend flavors.
